<<$head>>

sub new {
    my $class   = shift;
    my %options = @_;
    my $store   = delete $options{store} || new TM;       

    ref($class) and $class=ref($class);

    my $self = $class->SUPER::new( 
				   yyversion => '<<$version>>',
				   yystates  =>
<<$states>>,
				   yyrules   =>
<<$rules>>,
				   %options);
    $self->{USER}->{store}         = $store;
    return bless $self, $class;
}
